attributes.action: sanction liaison between DWP bodies and claimants doctors
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to sanction liaison between Atos or whichever body the relevant government departments use with respect to carrying out medical assessments, The DWP and a claimant’s doctors and consultants. This will prevent any confusion as to the true nature of the claimant’s medical condition. It will also save time and money with respect to the increasing number of appeals currently in progress due to the present points system and lack of communication between these bodies.
